root.name: Space Chimps
root.description: Xbox 360 Achievement ListSpace Chimps consists of 23 achievements worth a total of 1000 points:Beast Slayer 60 pointsComplete all Colossal Beast missions King of the Jungle 40 pointsComplete all Malgorian Jungle missionsMaster Gardner 40 pointsComplete all Luscious Garden missionsThe Escape 50 pointsComplete all Cave missionsZartog's Demise 70 pointsComplete all Zartog's Palace missionsWho needs invincibility? 35 pointsComplete any mission without dyingNice Balance 35 pointsHave Ham complete any mission past Holy Blow Hole! without falling into a pitHoly Blow Hole! Racer 40 pointsComplete Holy Blow Hole! in less than 3 minutes.In Digestion Racer 40 pointsComplete In Digestion in less than 4 minutes.Inside Guy Racer 40 pointsComplete Inside Guy in less than 4 minutes.Ham of the Jungle Racer 40 pointsComplete Ham of the Jungle in less than 4 minutes.Splork's Army Racer 40 pointsComplete Splork's Army in less than 6 minutes.Flower Power Racer 50 pointsComplete Flower Power in less than 4 minutesGarden of Beatin' Racer 50 pointsComplete Garden of Beatin' in less than 6 minutesSpelunking Monkey Racer 50 pointsComplete Spelunking Monkey in less than 6 minutes.Dungeons and Chimps Racer 50 pointsComplete Dungeons and Chimps in less than 5 minutes.Storm the Palace Racer 50 pointsComplete Storm the Palace in less than 5 minutes.Globhopper Magnet 30 pointsCollect all globhoppers in a mission.Bananas for Bananas 60 pointsCollect all the DOLE® Bananas in the game.No More Secrets 40 pointsUnlock all the bonus content.Where Credits Due 20 pointsWatch the credits all the way through.Bring the Pain 20 pointsDefeat all the enemies in a mission.Globhopper Guru 50 pointsCollect all 560 globhoppers in the game.
